Experience

Software Developer

Red Sky Technologies

Full-stack web development with a focus on front-end development for a hotel booking website. Built React components, pages, and features in compliance with approved Figma designs written in TypeScript. Debugged code and created bug fixes via browser-based debugging.

Created custom hooks to reduce the amount of code across the code base. Used SASS/SCSS to create responsive features for desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

Refactored files, deleting unnecessary code and reducing the file size by roughly 60% while keeping all of the necessary features and functionality intact.

Pushed new features into development, testing and production environments using continuous integration through the deployment pipelines.

Reviewed team member's merge requests and provided necessary feedback to the team member. Pushed the merge request through the deployment pipelines.

Refactored all of the projects pop-ups and drop-downs by configuring the SCSS calc and clamp functions, as well as adding overflow prevention on the containing body to make each element responsive and scrollable at all supported mobile and desktop resolutions. Utilized Flexbox to display the header and footer of all pop-ups and drop-downs at all times, on any device.

December 2021 - May 2022

Data Analyst

PaySafe

Worked alongside the Relationship Management team to ensure the merchant's application met card brand and bank requirements, as well as legal compliance. Created a QA process that reduced time required for checking by 71%, whilst decreasing overall errors by 90%. Created weekly reports listing the individual errors for each team member.

August 2019 - August 2020

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I love spending time learning new technologies in front-end web development and watching movies or television shows with my friends and family.

I'm also a huge fan of basketball, so when I'm not spending time watching basketball games, I'm playing pick-up basketball at a local park.

During the hotter months in California, I enjoy spending some time playing video games with my friends online and reading or watching videos on chess or cybersecurity.

Projects

Connect

Created a social platform using TypeScript, React, JavaScript, HTML and CSS for users to connect with each other.

Users can create, update, delete or view their profile. Users can also view other profiles created on the platform.

Used Toastify to notify the user whenever an action was taken. Used an axios request to gather information from an external API and saved the response data into our database.

Utilized Mongoose and the Express framework to save user profile information on the backend. Used scripts to build out JS files from the original TypeScript code.
